Frequently Asked Questions

How do I make a reservation?

To rent equipment, simply contact us directly by email bookings@vproaudio.rentals. Make sure to include the event dates, equipment needed, delivery or pick-up preferences, and the event location. Include a callback number if you want us to call you back.

How far in advance should I book the equipment?

We recommend booking at least 2-3 weeks in advance. However, we can often accommodate last-minute rentals depending on equipment availability.

Do you deliver and set up the equipment?

Yes, we offer delivery and setup services for our equipment. Delivery and setup are free if your event is within the Vacaville, CA area. Delivery charges and setup fees may apply based on your location (if outside of Vacaville) and the complexity of the setup. You can request this service when booking the equipment. You also have the option to self pick up and return the equipment.

How do I pick up and return the equipment?

You can pick up the equipment from our storage. Details will be provided upon confirmation. For returns, you must drop off the equipment by the agreed return date at our storage location.

What is included in the rental?

The rental includes the equipment itself, as well as basic cables and accessories (such as power cords and stands). Additional accessories or special requests may incur extra charges. If you're unsure, ask us for a detailed list of what's included.

What forms of payment do you accept?

Payments can be made on our online pay links which we will send to you upon confirmation. We accept all major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), debit cards, and bank transfers. A deposit may be required at the time of booking.

What if the equipment is damaged or stops working during my rental?

If the equipment is malfunctioning or damaged during your rental period, please notify us immediately. Depending on the situation, we will either repair or replace the equipment as quickly as possible. If the damage is due to misuse, you may be responsible for repair or replacement costs.

Are there any late fees for returning the equipment late?

Yes, late returns are subject to additional charges. If the equipment is returned later than the agreed-upon time, you will be charged a late fee, which is usually calculated on a daily basis. Please contact us in advance if you're running late to discuss potential solutions.

Do you provide technical support during my event?

Yes, we offer on-site technical support for certain events, depending on the equipment rented. This service can be arranged in advance and may incur additional fees. Please inquire about support when booking.

Do you offer package deals or discounts?

Yes, we offer package deals for events requiring multiple items or long-term rentals. Discounts may be available based on the rental duration, type of event, and specific equipment. Contact us for a custom quote.
